markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Metal-Veined Strikes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2574) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen. Choose either [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) or [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379). Your unarmed attacks are treated as the chosen type of metal.
name: Metal-Veined Strikes
